attributes.action: Legislate for it to be obligatory for retail foods to be labelled with it's country or countries of origin; NOT just where it was finally packaged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As food production standards and or environmental considerations in some countries of the world may not be to the level that the consumer in the U.K. agrees or is satisfied with, this labelling is vital.
Meat products in particular are a concern to many shoppers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
